job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Canvas is one of the core pillars under Michelangelo, Uber's machine learning platform. This team focuses on building and standardizing model dev experiences for ML Engineers and Data Scientists. We build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas, where ML engineers can develop the model solutions for their business needs in all critical ML phases, such as feature engineering, training, serving, ML-Ops, and monitoring. With the Canvas tool, users can iterate quickly and collaboratively during model dev time to build their ML solution, and the solution will be automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production.

   Now we are extending our modeling support to generative AI and large scale models. We are looking for talents with experience building and productionize large scaling models solving business problems.

   This team is formed by a group of talents with various expertise, such as modeling techniques, batch data processing optimization, orchestrations, dev tool development, and distributed algorithms.

   We also have a great reputation in the industry building leading edge solutions for ML platforms.

   What You'll Do

     * Provide solutions for data curation pipelines.
     * Develop the platform for training / analyzing / serving large scale models, embedding, NLP models.
     * As a core member of Michelangelo, work with team members in US to develop solutions for NLP and generative AI used by all ML engineers in Uber.
job_details.full_text:
Sr Software Engineer (Machine Learning)

Canvas is one of the core pillars under Michelangelo, Uber's machine learning platform. This team focuses on building and standardizing model dev experiences for ML Engineers and Data Scientists. We build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas, where ML engineers can develop the model solutions for their business needs in all critical ML phases, such as feature engineering, training, serving, ML-Ops, and monitoring. With the Canvas tool, users can iterate quickly and collaboratively during model dev time to build their ML solution, and the solution will be automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production.

   Now we are extending our modeling support to generative AI and large scale models. We are looking for talents with experience building and productionize large scaling models solving business problems.

   This team is formed by a group of talents with various expertise, such as modeling techniques, batch data processing optimization, orchestrations, dev tool development, and distributed algorithms.

   We also have a great reputation in the industry building leading edge solutions for ML platforms.

   What You'll Do

     * Provide solutions for data curation pipelines.
     * Develop the platform for training / analyzing / serving large scale models, embedding, NLP models.
     * As a core member of Michelangelo, work with team members in US to develop solutions for NLP and generative AI used by all ML engineers in Uber.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and standardizing model development experiences for ML Engineers and Data Scientists, focusing on the entire ML lifecycle from feature engineering to monitoring and serving. While it mentions extending support to generative AI and large-scale models, the core focus remains on the platform and tools for traditional ML model development and productionization. The responsibilities like 'data curation pipelines', 'training / analyzing / serving large scale models', and 'ML-Ops' align strongly with the definition and evidence profile of an ML Engineer, particularly the aspect of productionizing prototypes and building MLOps infrastructure.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Provide solutions for data curation pipelines' directly relates to the process of preparing and managing data for ML models.
job_tasks.phrase: Provide solutions for data curation pipelines

job_tasks.justification: The phrases 'develop the platform for training / analyzing / serving large scale models, embedding, NLP models' and 'extending our modeling support to generative AI and large scale models' clearly indicate the core activity of creating, training, and deploying models.
job_tasks.phrase: develop the platform for training / analyzing / serving large scale models, embedding, NLP models

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'extending our modeling support to generative AI and large scale models' indicates a focus on adapting and developing models, including generative ones.
job_tasks.phrase: extending our modeling support to generative AI and large scale models

job_tasks.justification: The description of building and operating 'the dev tool known as Canvas' and developing 'the platform' suggests significant software engineering effort to create user-facing tools and infrastructure for ML engineers.
job_tasks.phrase: build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'develop solutions for NLP and generative AI used by all ML engineers in Uber' implies building software solutions that incorporate these technologies for a wider user base.
job_tasks.phrase: develop solutions for NLP and generative AI used by all ML engineers in Uber

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'ML-Ops' as a critical ML phase within the Canvas tool, and the goal of solutions being 'automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production', points to MLOps practices.
The phrase 'building and productionize large scaling models' directly relates to the operational aspect of deploying and managing models in a production environment.
job_tasks.phrase: building and productionize large scaling models

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'solving business problems' indicates that the developed models and platforms are intended to address specific business needs.

soft_skills.phrase: work with team members in US
develop the model solutions for their business needs
